description:
A wizard brawler about spell drafting and beard envy, MageQuit allows up to 10 mages to battle it out online or 8 locally. Beards grow longer with each kill; the wizard with the longest beard after 9 rounds wins!

FEATURES
* 1-10 players online featuring crossplay, 1-8 offline
* 63 different spells (with more coming)
* Custom bots for online or offline play
* Anonymous skillbased or custom matchmaking
* Spell drafting
* Spell curving
* Play as teams, free for all, or 1v1
* Dynamic original sound track

WAYS TO PLAY MAGEQUIT
* Play offline with a group of up to 8
* Play solo in online quickplay or offline with bots
* Play online with a premade party of up to 10
* Join the online quickplay queue with a party of up to 5
* Play online with multiple players on the same console
name: MageQuit
